item.title: Using Org Mode in Hugo
item.description: Document navigation C-c C-n Move to the next heading C-c C-p Move to the previous heading TAB on a heading will collapse/expand Formatting Emphasis Style Code bold *bold* italics /italics/ literal =literal= link link Blocks Code can be formatted in blocks like this: Where ruby is the language type. You can auto fill out that structure with <sTAB at the beginning of a line. CSS For blocks you can set specifc classes to be added to the html, so for example
